sql.query: select count(*) as count from ( (CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PAYMENT AS P1 LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_vw_WB_PROCESS AS P2 ON P1.POLICY_APLN_NO = P2.POLICY_APLN_NO --AND P1.RSLT = P2.PROC_STATUS) ) LEFT JOIN CYBER.dbo.CYBER_TBL_WB_PROC_EMP AS P3 ON P2.PROC_EMP_NO = P3.EMP_NO ) --INNER JOIN prudb.dbo.insurancePolicy as P4 ON P1.POLICY_NO = P4.POLICYID where rslt in ('','0','2','3','1') $where
